Name: Establishment of the Committees, Subcommittees and Taskforces of the Council and the appointment of Council Members thereto.
Title: Resolution pursuant to Rule 7.10 of the Rules of the Council, as related to the establishment of the Committees, Subcommittees and Taskforces of the Council and the appointment of Council Members thereto.
BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Action: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.Description: This Resolution was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: A motion was made that this Resolution be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
History.BodyName: Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

History.Description: This Communication was Introduced by Council
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.
This Resolution was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Text:
By the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections

Resolved, pursuant to Rule 7.10 of the Rules of the Council that the Committees, Subcommittees, and Taskforces of the Council are hereby established and that the members and chairs appointed thereto are as follows:
